title: FS: T206 Ty Cobb Green Portrait PSA Authentic - $2100
author: wilkiebaby11

posts.post_title: FS: T206 Ty Cobb Green Portrait PSA Authentic - $2100
posts.post_content:
Was not designated as altered, but does measure short, presumably factory short. Front is impeccable and has no creases, wrinkles, or paper loss. 4 EX corners and colors that pop. Small amount of paper loss on the back that doesnt detract at all. For the price, you may be able to find a PSA 1 that has gone through the wringer a few times, or this guy that presents exceptionally well. VCP: $2589

Asking $2100 shipped
